desc: Scene from the 1994 American crime film 'Se7en' starring Brad Pitt and Morgan Freeman.

sttData.content: The opening scene of 'Se7en' shows a dark, chaotic cityscape.
sttData.speaker: Narrator

sttData.content: Detective Mills, portrayed by Brad Pitt, investigates a grisly murder scene.
sttData.speaker: Narrator

sttData.content: Detective Somerset, played by Morgan Freeman, arrives to assist Mills.
sttData.speaker: Narrator

sttData.content: The two detectives discuss the case, establishing their dynamic.
sttData.speaker: Detective Mills and Detective Somerset

sttData.content: The scene transitions to the investigation of another crime scene, further elevating the tension.
sttData.speaker: Narrator
